image-alt: a pair of sunglasses sitting on the sand at the beach
title: Happy Summer!
paragraph: The Library's summer hours are in effect from May 14 - August 21. If you're not at the beach, stop by, we'd love to see you!

title: Stories from Spec
paragraph: Check out Special Collections and Archives' Harvester blog featuring the unique materials stewarded by the library.

title: Chat help is available 24/7!
paragraph: Don't know where to start on that assignment? Get research help from a librarian 24 hours a day via chat!

image-alt: historic black and white photograph depicting young men diving into lake from a dock
title: Dive in!
paragraph: Take time to explore our digital collections featuring historic content from Special Collections.

title: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Explore our new My Library stories highlighting students and little-known library services.
